steps.description: This helps us tailor your experience to your specific needs.
steps.question: What motivates you?

choices.label: High School
choices.description: Preparing for exams and improving your grades

steps.question: Do you remember what you learn in the long term?

choices.label: Totally
choices.description: I remember 99% of what I learn in the long term

choices.label: Well
choices.description: I remember 75% of what I learn in the long term

choices.label: Partially
choices.description: I remember 50% of what I learn in the long term

choices.label: Little
choices.description: I remember less than 20% of what I learn in the long term

steps.question: How do you like to learn?

choices.label: Memory cards
choices.description: Question on one side, answer on the other (self-assessment)

steps.question: What do you want to learn from?

choices.label: AI
choices.description: By explaining what you want to learn

gettingStarted.alreadyHaveAnAccount: Do you already have an account?
gettingStarted.title:
Learn what you want
easily and retain on the long term.
gettingStarted.subtitle: Diane helps you regain control of your learning and improve your memory

madeForYou.title: Content created just for you
madeForYou.description: Diane creates content tailored to what you want to learn, whatever the field.

improvesYourMemory.title: Improve your memory
improvesYourMemory.description: Our spaced repetition algorithm allows you to retain what you learn over the long term while increasing your memory.

becomeSmarter.title: Get smarter
becomeSmarter.description: Your reasoning is based solely on your past experiences, so your knowledge is your most valuable asset.

gettingStarted.skip: Skip and try it out straight away

notificationPermission.title: Enable notifications
notificationPermission.description: Notifications will help you stay on top of your revisions and improve your learning.
notificationPermission.benefits: Receive personalized reminders to optimize your learning and never miss an important revision session

ebbinghaus.description: We forget 80% of what we learn in a month if we make no effort to revise or consolidate this information
ebbinghaus.title: According to the Ebbinghaus forgetting curve

spacedRepetition.description: Spaced repetition maintains knowledge by strategically revising content just when you're about to forget it. Each revision strengthens your memory.
spacedRepetition.title: The solution?

chat.title: What do you want to learn?
chat.placeholder: Talk about what you want to learn ...

seo.title: Create flashcards with AI
seo.description: Diane is an innovative AI-powered app designed to help you improve your memory and expand your knowledge. Through personalized flashcards, Diane creates review sessions tailored to your unique needs, allowing you to relearn efficiently and take your personal growth to the next level.
seo.ogDescription: Simplifies your learning with AI-powered flashcards and personalized revision sessions
